languages.text: "Ты предложил опуститься на колени Вольному Торговцу из рода фон Валанциус. Я даю тебе пять минут. Нет, не на то чтоб попросить прощения. На предсмертную речь и последнее покаяние".

"You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."
languages.original_text: "Ты предложил опуститься на колени Вольному Торговцу из рода фон Валанциус. Я даю тебе пять минут. Нет, не на то чтоб попросить прощения. На предсмертную речь и последнее покаяние".

traits.locale_text: "You offered the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line to kneel. I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and give your final confession."
"You offered the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line to kneel. I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and give your final confession."
"You propose they kneel, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line. I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and give your final confession."
"You propose they kneel, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line. I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and give your final confession."

"You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

"You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

languages.text: “你居然想让我，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人，在你面前跪下？我给你五分钟时间。这么做不是为了让你乞求宽恕，而是让你说出你的遗言，做最后的忏悔。”
languages.original_text: "You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

traits.locale_text: “你居然想让我，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人，在你面前跪下？我给你五分钟时间。这么做不是为了让你乞求宽恕，而是让你说出你的遗言，做最后的忏悔。”

languages.text: «¿Propone que yo, Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius, me arrodille? Le daré cinco minutos. No para que suplique perdón, sino para pronunciar sus últimas palabras y confesarse por última vez».
languages.original_text: "You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

traits.locale_text: «¿Propone que yo, Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius, me arrodille? Le daré cinco minutos. No para que suplique perdón, sino para pronunciar sus últimas palabras y confesarse por última vez».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者である{mf|俺|私}に、お前に跪けと？5分、猶予を与えよう。いや、許しを乞えとは言わない。最後の言葉を残し懺悔する時間をやろう」
languages.original_text: "You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者である{mf|俺|私}に、お前に跪けと？5分、猶予を与えよう。いや、許しを乞えとは言わない。最後の言葉を残し懺悔する時間をやろう」

languages.text: "Ihr wollt, dass ich, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} der Linie von Valancius, vor Euch auf die Knie falle? Ich gebe Euch fünf Minuten. Nicht um mich Vergebung zu bitten. Um Eure letzten Worte zu sprechen und Eure letzte Beichte abzulegen."
languages.original_text: "You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt, dass ich, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} der Linie von Valancius, vor Euch auf die Knie falle? Ich gebe Euch fünf Minuten. Nicht um um Vergebung zu bitten. Um Eure letzten Worte zu sprechen und Eure letzte Beichte abzulegen."

languages.text: « Vous demandez à ce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la lignée von Valancius s'agenouille devant vous ? Je vous donne cinq minutes. Non pour implorer mon pardon, mais pour nous confier vos derniers mots et faire votre ultime confession. »
languages.original_text: "You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

traits.locale_text: « Vous demandez à ce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la lignée von Valancius s'agenouille devant vous ? Je vous donne cinq minutes. Non pour implorer mon pardon, mais pour nous confier vos derniers mots et faire votre ultime confession. »

languages.text: "Von Valancius soyunun mevcut Hür Tacir'i olarak önünde diz çökmemi mi istiyorsun? Sana beş dakika veriyorum. Hayır, af dilemen için değil... Son sözlerini söyleyip itirafını duymak için."
languages.original_text: "You propose that I, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius line, kneel before you? I am giving you five minutes. No, not to beg forgiveness. To speak your last words and to offer your final confession."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius soyunun mevcut Hür Tacir'i olarak önünde diz çökmemi mi istiyorsun? Sana beş dakika veriyorum. Hayır, af dilemen için değil; son sözlerini söyleyip itirafını duymak için."
